item.title: Full list of talks, workshops and courses
item.description: 4-9 June 2018. Statistical methods for population-based cancer survival analysis, Veneto, Italy. http://cansurv.net/. 26 February - 2 March 2018: Statistical methods for population-based cancer survival analysis. Adelaide, Australia. 21-23 February 2018: Flexible parametric surival models in epidemiology 15-17 January 2018 Parametric Competing Risks and Multistate models, Swiss Epidemiology Winter School, Wengen, Switzerland. 30 November 2017. Some key issues in the reporting of national cancer survival statistics. Public Heath England, London.
